memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Experimental::DynamicView< DataType, P >::traits = Kokkos::ViewTraits<DataType, P...>
memberdef.name: traits

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Experimental::DynamicView< DataType, P >::value_type = typename traits::value_type
memberdef.name: value_type

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Experimental::DynamicView< DataType, P >::device_space = typename traits::memory_space
memberdef.name: device_space

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Experimental::DynamicView< DataType, P >::device_accessor = Impl::ChunkedArrayManager<device_space, value_type>
memberdef.name: device_accessor

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Experimental::DynamicView< DataType, P >::host_accessor = Impl::ChunkedArrayManager<host_space, value_type>
memberdef.name: host_accessor

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Experimental::DynamicView< DataType, P >::array_type = DynamicView<typename traits::data_type, typename traits::device_type>
memberdef.name: array_type

briefdescription.para: Compatible view of array of scalar types.

memberdef.definition: using Kokkos::Experimental::DynamicView< DataType, P >::const_type = DynamicView<typename traits::const_data_type, typename traits::device_type>
memberdef.name: const_type

briefdescription.para: Compatible view of const data type.

briefdescription.para: Compatible view of non-const data type.

briefdescription.para: Resizing in serial can grow or shrink the array size up to the maximum number of chunks.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &arg_label, const unsigned min_chunk_size, const unsigned max_extent)
memberdef.name: DynamicView

detaileddescription.para: Memory is allocated in chunks A maximum size is required in order to allocate a chunk-pointer array.

briefdescription.para: Dynamic views are restricted to rank-one and no layout. Resize only occurs on host outside of parallel_regions. Subviews are not allowed.
